title: Executive Order 11436-Suspending the Provisions of Section 6372 of Title 10 of the United States Code, Which Relate to the Retirement or Retention on the Active List of Certain Rear Admirals in the Navy
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by section 6386(c) of title 10 of the. United States Code, I hereby suspend the provisions of section 6372 of title 10 of the United States Code.
citation: Lyndon B. Johnson, Executive Order 11436-Suspending the Provisions of Section 6372 of Title 10 of the United States Code, Which Relate to the Retirement or Retention on the Active List of Certain Rear Admirals in the Navy Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/306392
